thread.title: BRIEF-The Lovesac Co Files For IPO

title: BRIEF-The Lovesac Co Files For IPO

organizations.name: brief-the lovesac co files for ipo reuters

text:
43 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-The Lovesac Co Files For IPO Reuters Staff 
April 20 (Reuters) - * THE LOVESAC COMPANY FILES FOR IPO 
* THE LOVESAC COMPANY SAYS IT INTENDS TO APPLY TO HAVE ITS COMMON STOCK LISTED ON NASDAQ GLOBAL MARKET UNDER THE SYMBOL “LOVE” 
* THE LOVESAC COMPANY SAYS ROTH CAPITAL PARTNERS IS UNDERWRITER TO IPO * THE LOVESAC COMPANY FILES FOR IPO OF UP TO $46 MILLION 
* THE LOVESAC COMPANY SAYS PROPOSED IPO PRICE IS AN ESTIMATE SOLELY FOR CALCULATING SEC REGISTRATION FEE Source text: bit.ly/2HLJe32
